sentences.english: Get out the phone book or check at your local library.

sentences.english: The Culture of the south of the River have deep roots in the colloquial stories.

sentences.english: By telling "Pusa Man" have "the emperor Gojong maternal uncles Wu 7 Prince.

sentences.english: Ling Mengchu and Li Yu are all masters of NiHuaBen.

sentences.english: Storytelling novels originated from the works of folklore speakers and marketplace writers.

sentences.english: Find your local chapter in your phone book or through redcross. org.

sentences.english: At the same time, the style and features of canal towns in south China also offer a unique narrative space to the vernacular novels.
sentences.chinese: 同時，江南水鄉又爲話本小說提供了別緻的敘事空間。

sentences.english: I've got to get the number from the book in the kitchen, she told herself.

sentences.english: Some people never read a newspaper, let alone a book.
sentences.chinese: 有些人從未讀過報紙，更不用平話本了。

sentences.english: A boaster and a liar are cousin.
